items.sentence: When Mary was a child, her family was dirt poor.
Tom and Mary didn't seem to get along very well.

I'm definitely going to try to be there on time.
I'd really hoped I'd be able to see Tom do that.
I was told that I could get in without a ticket.
Tom says he's gotten used to his wife's cooking.
Tom didn't realize Mary wasn't enjoying herself.
That exercise is good for the abdominal muscles.
They carried the boats almost thirty kilometers.
Tom told everybody that Mary could speak French.
Tom planned on staying in Boston for a few days.
Tom thinks Mary will be here in Boston all week.

Tom said Mary should've stayed in Boston longer.
